Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.fsys.interfaces

Interface FileSystemInterfaceDescriptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileSystemInMemory, FileSystemOnClassLoader, FileSystemOnFile, FileSystemOnFileSystem, FileSystemOnRMI, FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly
public interface FileSystemInterfaceDescriptor

This interface describes file system drivers in user-friendly form. In conjunction with JFileSystemChanger allows to select any file system by Swing form

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getClassName()
    Get class name of the file system driver.
    java.lang.String getDescriptionId()
    Get description of the file system.
    java.lang.String getHelpId()
    Get help id for the given driver.
    javax.swing.Icon getIcon()
    Get icon associated with the given driver.
    FileSystemInterface getInstance()
    Create file system instance.
    java.lang.String getLicenseContentId()
    Get license content identifier for the given driver (usually license text).
    java.lang.String getLicenseId()
    Get license identifier for the given driver.
    java.net.URI getLocalizerAssociated()
    Get localizer associated with the given driver.
    java.net.URI getUriTemplate()
    Get URI template for the given driver.
    java.lang.String getVendorId()
    Get vendor ID for the file system.
    java.lang.String getVersion()
    Return driver version
    default boolean isReadOnly()
    Is the file system always read-only
    boolean testConnection​(java.net.URI connection, LoggerFacade logger)
    Test connection to the given file system with the given URI

  • Method Details

    • getClassName

      java.lang.String getClassName()

      Get class name of the file system driver. Good idea is to use driver.getClass().getSimpleName() as a result

      Returns:
      file system driver class name. Can't be null

    • getVersion

      java.lang.String getVersion()

      Return driver version

      Returns:
      driver version. Can't be null

    • getLocalizerAssociated

      java.net.URI getLocalizerAssociated()

      Get localizer associated with the given driver. It can be used to localize all string returns for this interface methods

      Returns:
      localizer associated. Can be null

    • getDescriptionId

      java.lang.String getDescriptionId()

      Get description of the file system. Value returned can be used as key for localizer associated

      Returns:
      Description string. Can be null

    • getVendorId

      java.lang.String getVendorId()

      Get vendor ID for the file system. Value returned can be used as key for localizer associated

      Returns:
      Vendor id string. Can be null

    • getIcon

      javax.swing.Icon getIcon()

      Get icon associated with the given driver.

      Returns:
      Icon instance. Can be null

    • getLicenseId

      java.lang.String getLicenseId()

      Get license identifier for the given driver. Value returned can be used as key for localizer associated

      Returns:
      license id. Can't be null

    • getLicenseContentId

      java.lang.String getLicenseContentId()

      Get license content identifier for the given driver (usually license text). Value returned can be used as key for localizer associated

      Returns:
      license content id. Can be null

    • getHelpId

      java.lang.String getHelpId()

      Get help id for the given driver. Value returned can be used as key for localizer associated

      Returns:
      Help id. Can be null

    • getUriTemplate

      java.net.URI getUriTemplate()

      Get URI template for the given driver. URI must be absolute and contain at least File system URI scheme and this diver sub-scheme. It's strongly recommended to use URI pointed to root of the file system (path content contains '/' only)

      Returns:
      URI template. Can't be null

    • isReadOnly

      default boolean isReadOnly()

      Is the file system always read-only

      Returns:
      true if yes

    • getInstance

      FileSystemInterface getInstance() throws EnvironmentException

      Create file system instance. Must returns the same instance as call to ServiceLoader.load(Class) method.

      Returns:
      File system instance returned. Cn't be null
      Throws:
      EnvironmentException - if File system instance can't be created

    • testConnection

      boolean testConnection​(java.net.URI connection, LoggerFacade logger) throws java.io.IOException

      Test connection to the given file system with the given URI

      Parameters:
      connection - URI to connect to the file system. Must be absolute and it's scheme and sub-scheme must match URi returned by getUriTemplate() method
      logger - logger to print connection messages to
      Returns:
      true is connection successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - any problems on connection
